Description:
Detects the usage of schtasks with the delete flag and the asterisk symbol to delete all tasks from the schedule of the local computer, including tasks scheduled by other users.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Delete All Scheduled Tasks
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\schtasks.exe' and (command like '% /delete %' and command like '%/tn \*%' and command like '% /f%')
